attributes.action: After leaving EU remove all MP’s who ignore 2016 referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
Evidence is three years of voting for leaving the EU but contradicting themselves. Their behaviour has put this country in a poor position to negotiate a descent withdrawal agreement and made this country a laughing stock of the world. 
They have destroyed the trust of the people and if they continue in their position, the trust will not be returned.
attributes.background:
This is a unique period of time, our politicians have wasted three years, caused great distress to the nation and the economy by ignoring the 2016 referendum. 
Each of these MP’s should have their pension and other financial payouts to be taken away from them as compensation to the UK population.

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MP's from office because of their views or opinions. 

You might like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/257347
